description: Mex Landscaping is a team of experienced landscapers, builders, and arborists. We work with your ideas to bring your vision to reality and boost the curb appeal and value of your property.
disambiguatingDescription: We serve residential and commercial properties across Pennsylvania, offering award-winning landscape design and installation, excavation and grading drainage, sodding, core aeration and overseeding, shrub hedge trimming and removal, seeding, planting and transplanting, mulching, weeding, and other services.
slogan: Mex Landscape Services at Your Disposal
